“We believe Pinterest can build a strong ad platform as it grows its user base and improves monetization,” he says.

“Its ad sales remain less dependent on Apple’s data regarding user behavior outside of the Pinterest app,” says Ali Mogharabi, who covers Pinterest and Twitter for Morningstar.

J.P Morgan’s Anmuth says Apple’s policy change has had little impact on Pinterest.

TikTok, while wonderfully addictive, promotes doomscrolling and is owned by Bytedance which will always face some backlash in the US.

Google will like Pinterest’s lack of vulnerability to changes in IOS.
